channel.title: A blank source?
channel.description: uhm i havnt found any good server i like for use on silabsoft client so i decided im going to learn and make my own but i cant find a blank source any where, if any1 has one please post it here and maybe a link on how to start a source for newbs :P

item.title: A blank source?
item.dc:creator: @sh1pwr3ck sh1pwr3ck
item.description:
@sh1pwr3ck wrote:

edit runserver.bat and add this

@echo off color 0a title pwnallscape - By Drake java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server

and add a compiler by dl another source and putting tht compiler in the server and if compiler dont work edit it and add

@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit

there=)

Read full topic
